inclusion.criterion: no antihypertensive drug usage prior 12 months
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of malignant hypertension or hypertensive encephalopathy or cerebrovascular accident within the 6 months prior to the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: chronic liver diseases, and recent acute illness and/or history of any overt chronic inflammatory disease
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Wilson disease confirmed by high liver copper concentration. He is on standard CAPD program.
